attributes.action: Stop the privatisation of our NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Mr Cameron
Re: Health and social care bill.

Health, and health care is one of the main things for people in society to have and every person should have the opportunity to receive health care when they become ill. Society needs and wants the NHS. Privatisation is not an option, doctors would/may concentrate too much on the money aspect of people's health rather than the actual caring aspect. There is an unequal distribution of 'Wealth' within society please do not let it be the same for 'Health'. Equal opportunities for everyone to receive health care, Please leave our NHS alone.  We do not want a "No Wealth No Health" scenario thank you.
